headline: Palo Alto Networks, Inc. (PANW): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Palo Alto Networks, Inc. on Disruptive analytics’ Substack by Magnus Ofstad. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on PANW. Palo Alto Networks, Inc.’s share was trading at $190.52 as of August 29th. PANW’s trailing and forward P/E were 119.08 and 50.00 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Palo […]

headline: Morgan Stanley Names Palo Alto Networks (PANW) a Top Pick, Raises PT to $216
summary: Palo Alto Networks, Inc. (NASDAQ:PANW) is one of the AI Stocks Analysts Are Backing Right Now. On September 2, Morgan Stanley analyst Keith Weiss raised the price target on the stock to $216.00 (from $210.00) while maintaining an Overweight rating. The analyst not only resumed coverage, but also named Palo Alto as a Top Pick in […]
